law.catch_line: Burden To Prove License Or Admission To Practice As Attorney At Law
law.text: A defendant in a criminal prosecution, relying for his justification upon a license, appointment, admission to practice as an attorney at law, or authority, shall prove the same; and, until so proved, the presumption shall be that he is not so authorized.
